attributes.additional_details: The current year 12 students are going to suffer academically they are currently missing vital lesson time, that is going to be mentally stressing for both students and teachers to catch up on all missed and misunderstood work in September. It is negligent for you to leave year 12 students to teach themselves 3 or 4 a level courses alone.
attributes.background: To cancel the 2021 A level exams, and assess other ways for students to get graded fairly.
